Reviews.Title: “Good place to stay in a low budget.”
Reviews.Author: traveluis
Reviews.Content: clean quiet hotel close metro supermarket corner outside looks bit scary inside youll clean quiet friendly staff internet floor pay 5 euros wifi stay breakfast included feel safe hotel hotel managed saving money clean basic stay bed extremely confortable confortable 4 star hotel impressed sheets white clean smell cigarette

Reviews.Title: “Good clean, basic hotel - very good value for money”
Reviews.Author: BorisR
Reviews.Content: stayed june days children basic clean spacious quiet hotel provided travel cot sofa bed eldest child staff friendly helpful breakfast day service occasionally little haphazard breakfast tasty nice spread cheese bread fruit etc staff milk fridge children whenever service buy selection alcoholic nonalcoholic drinks reception excellent location mins main street quiet road supermarket corner near ubahn stations
